name: Luposian: Prelude to Creation
description:
Luposian: "Prelude To Creation" is a game about a journey of self-discovery to find out what you are, why you were created, and what your ultimate purpose is.  Consisting of several "Stages", which slowly reveal more and more of your path and purpose.

This is only a preliminary version.  Development progresses regularly, about one revision every month.  If you like what you see, feel free to help fund this game's development, to complete Stage 1 "In One's Beginning".

HINT:  W, S, A, D or arrow keys for movement.  To run, hold down [Shift].

Character/game concept:  Jared Falvo

3D Graphics/animation/developer: Kam_27 (located on Fiverr)

Music: Eric Matyas ("The Darkness Below")

Game Engine: CopperCube 6.6
